entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
